resources.string:
Sorry for the recent lack of updates. I promise to be better.

I hope you find the new app more intuitive, quicker and reliable. Some features will be missing at first, but I will slowly rebuild them. At least you can expect full offline access to your ratings.

Does that sound nice?
The biggest source on craft beer is at your fingertips! To get the most out of your beer experience, please sign in to your RateBeer account.
Please hold on while work on this brand new app. You can already search the most complete online craft beer database.\n\nRating beers and viewing your account is coming very soon, promise!
created by Eric Kok of 2312 development

Don't worry - they are safe.

All ratings you have uploading to RateBeer using the old app or entered directly on ratebeer.com are stored on the website. In fact, when you sign in, they are fully synchronized for quick searching and available offline access when a connection is not available.

Any offline ratings you had made and not yet uploaded are still stored on your device, in the app's database. They should be transferred when upgrading the app and visible in your main ratings screen. Very soon you will be able to upload them again, when the rating feature is finished. Very soon, I promise!
Connection failure - your connection is poor or RateBeer is offline
Sorry, your account could not be upgraded
Your username or password is incorrect
Both username and password are required fields
